sentences.en: Every garment in the shop has a price mark sewn on it.
sentences.cn: 店里每一件衣服都缝有价签.

sentences.en: I am not worthy to touch the hem of her garment.

sentences.cn: 下两针织在一起,把衣服弄瘦点儿.

sentences.en: Numitor took the soiled, torn garment in his hands.
sentences.cn: 纽米托拿起这件又脏又破的长袍.

sentences.en: She disguised her true sex under a man's garment.
sentences.cn: 她穿着男人的衣服隐瞒自己的真实性别.

sentences.en: She left school to go to work as a dress model in the garment company.
sentences.cn: 她离开学校到服装公司当时装模特儿.

sentences.en: She pulled the garment on and zipped it up.
sentences.cn: 她穿上衣服并拉好拉链。

sentences.cn: 她穿着一件很没形的针织外套.

sentences.en: She works in the garment district of Manhattan.
sentences.cn: 她在曼哈顿的服装加工区工作。

sentences.en: Simply scaling up a size 10 garment often leads to disaster.
sentences.cn: 只是将10号衣服改大的话结果往往会很不理想。

sentences.cn: 他们苦心经营的服装商店也以失败而告终.

sentences.en: The skin darkened where it was compressed by the elastic garment.
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤上,被有松紧的胸衣束得太紧的地方,微现黑色.

sentences.en: The thicker the material, the less susceptible the garment will be to wet conditions.
sentences.cn: 布料越厚实，衣服就越不容易浸湿。

sentences.en: This garment must be dry-cleaned only.
